name: backend
description: Test task for nodeJs backend client

scripts.db:create:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test yarn sequelize-cli db:drop && cross-env NODE_ENV=test yarn sequelize-cli db:create
scripts.db:setup:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test yarn sequelize-cli db:migrate && cross-env NODE_ENV=test yarn sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.db:create: yarn sequelize-cli db:create && yarn sequelize-cli db:migrate && yarn sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.db:reset: yarn sequelize-cli db:drop && yarn sequelize-cli db:create && yarn sequelize-cli db:migrate && yarn sequelize-cli db:seed:all
